messages.title: Standing up for you
messages.content: I'm standing because there aren't enough disabled women in Parliament making decisions for people like me and I want to change that. I want to work for a fairer society and put your priorities first.

messages.title: Standing up for social justice
messages.content: I'm standing up for social justice by fighting austerity and Tory cuts. I'm standing for a fair social security system, for more benefits for those who need them, and improving lives for thousands of people.

messages.title: Standing up for workers' rights
messages.content: I'm standing up for workers' rights by ensuring an end to exploitation and improving workers' wages and conditions. I'll stand up for a living wage, good jobs and a strong economy.

messages.title: Standing up for you in the community
messages.content: I'm standing up for community by putting your priorities first and working with local authorities for better services and policies.

messages.title: Standing together
messages.content: I'm standing for fairness and justice, our community and opportunities for everyone. Let's stand up for Glasgow North.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting austerity and Tory cuts, standing for a fair social security system, and improving lives for thousands.
Ensuring an end to exploitation, fair wages, good job conditions, and a strong economy.
Working with local authorities for better services and policies, putting community priorities first.
